name: Sweet Potato Sausage Bites
author: Grimm's Fine Foods
summary: Mennonite Farmer Sausage nestled between gooey brie and sweet potato slices. This Grimm's Fine Foods appetizer is gluten free.
ingredients: 2 medium sweet potatoes, sliced into 1/4-inch rounds
1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese, cut into 1-inch chunks
1 package Grimm’s Fine Foods Sausage Bites (such as Mennonite Style Farmer Sausage Bites)
directions: Toss sweet potato rounds with olive oil and arrange in a single layer on a sheet pan
Bake for 15 minutes or until cooked through (smaller rounds cook faster)
Top sweet potato rounds with a slice of Brie
Slice Grimm's Sausage Bites and add 3 to 4 pieces to each sweet potato round
Garnish with cranberries, chopped pecans, and fresh rosemary
Apply a drizzle of honey to each round
